text: Jay - Z dropped his new music video, The Story of O. J., on TIDAL earlier today. The 4 minute and 16 - second piece is the latest “ visual ” to come out from the rapper ’ s 4 : 44 album, which has already gone platinum in less than one week out, according to TIDAL. The music video is animated and takes on racist cartoons from Fleischer Studios, Warner Bros., Disney, and others. Source EOnline Also On 106. 7 WTLC :
